summary: Comprehensive implementation plan for building the Chordy.ai landing page. Details the creation of a modern, futuristic single-page application with HTML/CSS/JavaScript, including all required sections (Hero, Problem, Solution, How It Works, Role Selection Waitlist, Trust & Safety, Roadmap, Final CTA), animated background, modal forms for 5 user segments, responsive design, and smooth animations. Includes verification plan with browser testing and manual checks.
